ICacheProviderMethods
 
Packagecom.googlecode.flexxb.cache
Interfacepublic interface ICacheProvider
Implementors ObjectCache, ObjectPool

This interface defines a cache provider recognised by FlexXB engine.


Public Methods
 MethodDefined By
  
clearCache(... typeList):void
Clears the cache for all the objects with given class.

ICacheProvider
Method Detail
clearCache()method
public function clearCache(... typeList):void

Clears the cache for all the objects with given class. If no class is specified, then all cache is cleared.

Parameters

... typeList — List of types for which the cache will be flushed. ALL instances will be flushed if null or empty

getFromCache()method 
public function getFromCache(id:String, clasz:Class):*

Get an instance of the specified type and with the specified id from the cache

Parameters

id:String — object identifier
 
clasz:Class — object class

Returns
* — instance defined by id and type if it exists, null otherwise
getNewInstance()method 
public function getNewInstance(clasz:Class, id:String, parameters:Array = null):*

Gets a new instance of the specified object class. The constructor may require arguments which are supplied with the parameters list. After the instance is created it will be placed into the cache.

Parameters

clasz:Class — object class
 
id:String — object identifier
 
parameters:Array (default = null) — parameter list to be used when calling the constructor

Returns
* — newly created instance
isInCache()method 
public function isInCache(id:String, clasz:Class):Boolean

Determines whether an object with the given id is aleady cached.

Parameters

id:String — the id under which the object should have been cached
 
clasz:Class — the class of the object

Returns
Boolean — true if there is an object cached under the given id and class.
